title: Smart Data Models - GovSteamFV2
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Steam turbine governor with reheat time constants and modeling of the effects of fast valve closing to reduce mechanical power.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteamFV2

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of the turbine power developed by turbine sections not involved in fast valving (K). Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Alternate Base used instead of Machine base in equipment model if necessary (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor time constant (T1). Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reheater time constant (T3). Default: 0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time after initial time for valve to close (Ta). Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time after initial time for valve to begin opening (Tb). Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time after initial time for valve to become fully open (Tc). Default: 0

ti.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Initial time to begin fast valving (Ti). Default: 0

tt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant with which power falls off after intercept valve closure (Tt). Default: 0
